project.name: hxCurl
project.description: HaXe neko/php binding for the curl library. This project based on knarf's "curl" (http://lib.haxe.org/p/curl/) and Raza Tiana's "haxe-curl" (http://code.google.com/p/haxe-curl/) projects.
project.version: Major refactoring. Added static get() and post() methods.
